an4.263:1.1: “Catuhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato balo abyatto asappuriso khatam upahatam attanam pariharati, savajjo ca hoti sanuvajjo vinnunam, bahunca apunnam pasavati.
an4.263:1.3: Savajjena kayakammena, savajjena vacikammena, savajjena manokammena, savajjaya ditthiya—
an4.263:1.4: imehi kho, bhikkhave, catuhi dhammehi samannagato balo abyatto asappuriso khatam upahatam attanam pariharati, savajjo ca hoti sanuvajjo vinnunam, bahunca apunnam pasavati.
an4.263:2.1: Catuhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato pandito viyatto sappuriso akkhatam anupahatam attanam pariharati, anavajjo ca hoti ananuvajjo vinnunam, bahunca punnam pasavati.
an4.263:2.3: Anavajjena kayakammena, anavajjena vacikammena, anavajjena manokammena, anavajjaya ditthiya—
an4.263:2.4: imehi kho, bhikkhave, catuhi dhammehi samannagato pandito viyatto sappuriso akkhatam anupahatam attanam pariharati, anavajjo ca hoti ananuvajjo vinnunam, bahunca punnam pasavati”ti.
